mapper.select: SELECT scr.company_id,sc.title,ac.service_center, (select ct.leader_ship_name from ss_com_task ct where ct.company_id= sc.company_id AND ct.com_account_id=scr.com_account_id) as leader_ship_name FROM ss_account_com_relation scr LEFT JOIN sal_company sc ON scr.company_id = sc.company_id LEFT JOIN sal_af_company ac ON ac.company_id = sc.company_id WHERE scr.com_account_id = #{comAccountId}

SELECT a.com_account_id, a.ss_account, a.com_account_name, b.company_id, c.title AS 'company_name' FROM ss_com_account a INNER JOIN ss_account_com_relation b ON a.com_account_id = b.com_account_id INNER JOIN sal_company c ON b.company_id = c.company_id WHERE a.is_active = 1 AND b.is_active = 1 AND c.is_active = 1 AND a.com_account_id = #{comAccountId}
